transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha sir. Hello. Haan ji sir, Saransh baat kar raha tha. Call disconnect ho gaya. 
Customer: Ha, woh ticket toh close kar diya na aapne?
Executive: Nahi ticket close nahi kiya. Ticket main hi close karunga. Jinka aapke paas phone aaya tha na, unka senior hi baat kar raha hu main.
Customer: Achha. Woh unhone backend se call lagaya tha. 
Executive: Haan, woh bhi call aaya tha. Mere ko laga ki aap hi call kar rahe ho. Theek hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi, main batata hu. Jo aapka account manager hai, uska naam Sanchika hai. Uske senior ka naam Shashank hai. Mera naam Saransh hai. Toh woh naam mein confuse ho jaata hai kai baar. Toh woh kya hai woh, woh Shashank jo hai woh aapko ticket ke liye call kiya tha. Aapka jo feedback Sanchika ke liye aaya tha ki woh badi service ke liye bol rahi thi, uske liye maine call kiya tha. Aapke do ticket open hue the sir mere paas.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Haan. Toh main aapko chart bhej raha tha. Woh main aapse discuss karna chahta hu. Ki WhatsApp pe maine ek chart bheja. Dikh pa rahe hai sir aap?
Customer: Haan chart kya keh raha tha? Haan chart hai.
Executive: Ye kis type se hai. Ye ye ye hai ki IndiaMART pe aapke total jo products bane hue hai right, usse kitni buyleads IndiaMART ke paas aa rahi hai per annum se. Toh agar aap dekhenge, toh jo aapka jaise ye product hai clamp. Theek hai na, sabse upar ye rank pe jo bana hua hai. Uske 1319 total buyleads hai saal mein. Matlab mahine ki 100, 110 aise karke milenge. Right? Aur agar aap jaise CPVC clamp agar main dekh raha hu, toh last se chauthe number pe dekhiye CPVC clamp ke liye sirf 280 customer aate hai pure saal mein IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh jo ye lead hai na sir, buylead jo availability hai woh limited hai. Is wajah se jo customer flow hai aapke paas right, buylead jo bhi limited aata hai. Is wajah se jo aapka conversion hai right, woh bhi limited buyleads pe hota hai. Lekin iske liye sabse achhi baat ye hai ki aap jis location se deal kar rahe hai, jis area mein aap deal kar rahe hai right, us area ke jo bhi buylead aap per annum karenge, woh aapko properly milegi aur uska benefit aapko mil sakta hai. Toh ek simple simple reason ye hai ki jo aap logo ka buylead allocated hai hamare paas right, aur jo buylead hum aapko share kar rahe hai, for example aapka location Ranchi hai, Jharkhand hai right. Ab koi customer ko for example CPVC clamp kharidna hai right. Aap unke better competition de rahe hai aur ek Delhi ka supplier usko better competition de raha hai right. Woh kispe trust kar sakta hai easily? Aap pe kyunki trust kar sakta hai. Right sir? Ho sakta hai Jharkhand ke andar 10 hi lead hai. Lekin jo hongi usme aapke deal hone ki probability zyada hogi as compared to dusre person ke. Toh ye is tarah se chalta hai.
Customer: Samajh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Haan matlab is is category mein leads bahut kam aa rahi hai ye bhi ek.
Executive: Isliye toh kam aa rahi hai bhai sahab. Is wajah se aisa ho raha hai ye. Aur ye 12 mahine ka chart jo aap dekh sakte hai ki pichle saal kya chal raha tha is mahine mein right. Toh hamare paas 12 mahine ka chart aata hai. Shayad aapko December ka dikha raha hoga. Main ye kahu ki December mein bahut achha lead aa raha tha CPVC clamp ka 40 lead aa raha tha. Nahi. Aap dekhiye January 2025 se ye lead 23, 24, 23, 24 aisa aa raha hai right. Toh 10 se 15 buylead is category mein aur kam hi ho gayi hai. Right sir? Same isi tarah se agar aap dekhiye clamp ki category mein sabse upar jo hai, 111 lead aa raha hai right. Aaj ki tarikh mein 94 lead abhi bhi aa raha hai. 
Customer: Lead toh matlab jaise hai na ki plastic wale leads aate hai. Main metal mein.
Executive: Haan lead sir aap woh category category aap define karenge ki plastic mein aati hai aapko metal mein chahiye. Hai na?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur aise matlab jaise purane parties hai woh call karte hai toh unko achha load hai unke paas consumption hai. 
Executive: Woh kabhi kya hai. 
Customer: Lekin jaise ab aap ye samajhiye, ab hamare saath jude. Theek hai na, for example aapke saath koi customer juda hamare yaha se right. Usse service achhi lagi aapka. Aapka pricing achha laga, aapka quality achha laga right. Woh next time kiske paas jaega? Aapke paas ki mere paas?
Customer: Aapke paas aayega.
Executive: Mere se toh naya hi client milega. Right sir? Aur company ke paas naya client kab aayega? Jab woh kisi ko reference dega ya koi purchase karega. Right sir? Toh isliye kya hota hai ki buylead ka variation chalta rehta hai sir. Ye jo buylead ka count hai, jaise main aapko dikha raha hu na clamps mein 1319. Agar kisi ne mere paas 20 lakh ki bhi service li na sir, toh uske liye bhi 1319 ka hi count dikhega.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Toh package ke hisab se limited nahi hota. Achha. Haan ji. 
Customer: Nahi woh keh rahe hai ki aapki listing, aapki listing down ho gayi hai jis karan se aapko ye. 
Executive: Woh listing down nahi. Woh woh main batata hu kya hai. Woh ye aapko ye bol rahe the ki jis tarah se aap dekh rahe hai abhi buylead ka flow kam hai right. Customer chahta hai ki mere paas customer zyada se zyada aaye right. Woh ye kehna chah rahe hai ki aapki industry mein competition din par din badhta ja raha hai. Competition kyun badh raha hai? Aap kisi customer ne for example mere paas 50,000 diye. Usne ek saal ka service liya. Theek hai. 50,000 dene ke baad for example usne main kehta hu saal bhar mein 1 lakh, 1.5 lakh ka business nikal liya usne. Right sir? Ab uske dimaag mein ye hai ki jaha main 50,000 ek saal ke de raha tha woh teen saal ka le leta hu 1 lakh plus GST karega right. Toh usne apni visibility ko grow kiya. Woh ek level upar aa gaya right. Ab ek level upar aake usne apni visibility ko grow kar liya. Woh ye kehna chah rahe hai aapne last time jab humse deal kiya tha right. I think 2023 mein aapki humse deal hui thi last time jab hui thi. Right sir? 2023 se lekar 2023 se 24, 24 se 25 ya 25 se 26. 36 months ki aapne iski journey ki aur hum currently jo baithe hue hai right. 24 mahine pure bhar chuke hai. In do saal mein jo bhi naye keywords aaye, jo bhi naye customers add on hue right, uske basis pe jo customers hamare paas add ho rahe hai right, woh pehle aapke paas badhenge. Uske liye basically jo aapko suggest kar rahe hai ki sir aap bhi competition mein ek level upar jaaiye kyunki jab aapne TrustSeal liya tha aap original MDC chalate the right. Unhone bhi apne business ko badha kar TrustSeal mein convert kar liya. Aap ye samajhiye aaj ki tarikh mein mere paas ek naya customer aata hai na sir, usse hum 40,000 lete hai basic service ka right. Aur hamara jo TrustSeal ka package hota hai ek saal ka woh hamara hai woh 69,000 ka. Toh aap khud bataiye jo insaan 40,000 dega kya woh mujhe 20,000 extra deke TrustSeal nahi lega? Obviously dega. Right sir? Lekin jo upar dikh raha hai uske paas customer saamne se call karte hai isliye uske lead jaldi convert ho jaati hai. Isliye ye log aapko suggest kiye ki aap aage badhna chahe toh aap aage badh sakte hai aur apne business ko grow kar sakte hai.
Customer: Iske alawa aapne kaha, maine dekhiye maine unko bhi kaha dekhiye main payment mere paas abhi nahi hai. Aur kaha, please aage nahi badh sakta hu. Lekin jab pehle main aapse basic service se juda tha tab toh bahut achhe client aaye aur abhi badhiya usse badhiya service hai toh client kyun nahi aa rahe hai ye main. 
Executive: Client ka flow, client ka flow jo hai na sir, pichhe jo backend se hum chal rahe hai pichle saal ke baad mein. Agar aap chahe toh main karwa sakta hu aapke liye on approval. Personally karwa deta hu main aapke liye. Ye product se aap deal kar rahe hai na, GI pipe plan, GI fabric plan right sir. Inke jo naye naye synonyms aaye hai na IndiaMART pe jo aapke competitors ne diye hue hai right, woh keywords ke leads main aapke saath share karwa deta hu on approval. Theek hai? Toh woh kya hoga ki ye jo keywords ke leads aapke saath share hogi uske bas ye word aapke kaam par lage. Woh aap apne according mein kyun orient kar rahe hai. Aur batao. Theek hai? Hmm hmm. Ek request hai sir aapke paas mein mail pe mera feedback aaya hai. Ek baar aap mera feedback please share kar dijiye woh mere regarding mein hoga aapke paas. 
Customer: Theek hai, main kar dunga sir. Theek hai na? Aapko WhatsApp pe bhi ping kar diya hai, mail pe bhi kar diya hai. Aap mujhe feedback de dijiyega aur baki main kaam start karwa deta hu aapke kuch synonyms biche honge woh synonyms ke wajah se. Theek hai na?
Customer: Ji ji ji. Chalo okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states leads are very low.

- Customer says payment is currently unavailable.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a chart of buyleads.

- Executive explained the benefits of TrustSeal.

- Executive offered to share new keywords leads.

- Executive asked for feedback on the call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will start the work.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, keywords, competition
